channel.title: Nb on rooyca
channel.description: Recent content in Nb on rooyca

item.title: Migrating from buku to nb with Python
item.description: What is buku buku is, according to its developers, “a powerful bookmark manager and a personal textual mini-web”. One of its main strengths is that its records are stored in an SQL database, making searches extremely fast. What is nb nb is, according to its GitHub description, a “CLI and local web plain text note‑taking, bookmarking, and archiving with linking, tagging, filtering, search, Git versioning & syncing, Pandoc conversion, + more, in a single portable script”.
